text: Toby Penty (born 12 August 1992) is a badminton player from England.Toby Penty: England number one on alopecia struggles, BBC Sport, 19 May 2020 He started playing badminton at aged 9, and won U-19 English National Championships in 2011. In 2010, he won junior title in Dutch and Swiss. In 2017, he won the Swedish International tournament in the men's singles event. == Achievements == === BWF Grand Prix (1 title) === The BWF Grand Prix has two levels: Grand Prix Gold and Grand Prix. It is a series of badminton tournaments, sanctioned by Badminton World Federation (BWF) since 2007. Men's singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! Year ! Tournament !
